hero.headline: Find Your Next Doctoral Candidate
hero.subline: Streamline your research group's hiring process with TUMApply's comprehensive platform.

doctoralJourney.headline: Supporting Doctoral Candidates at TUM
doctoralJourney.text: TUM provides excellent support for doctoral candidates through various programs and resources. As a professor, you can leverage these resources to attract and support the best talent for your research group.

1.title: Create Job Posting
1.description: Define your research position with detailed requirements and qualifications

2.title: Review Applications
2.description: Browse through qualified candidates and their submitted documents

3.title: Evaluate Candidates
3.description: Use our rating system to assess and compare applicants systematically

4.title: Communicate & Select
4.description: Send notifications and select the best candidate for your research group

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Find answers to common questions about using TUMApply as a professor

login.title: How do I log in to TUMApply?
login.content: Professors can log in using their TUM SSO credentials. Click the login button and you'll be redirected to the TUM authentication system.

multipleApplications.title: Can I manage multiple job postings?
multipleApplications.content: Yes, you can create and manage multiple job postings simultaneously. Each posting can have its own requirements, applications, and evaluation criteria.

documents.title: What documents can I require from candidates?
documents.content: You can require various documents including CV, cover letter, transcripts, research proposals, and reference letters. Customize requirements for each position.

status.title: How do I track application status?
status.content: Use the application overview page to track all applications. You can see submission dates, document status, and evaluation progress for each candidate.
